columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the server.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a server uniquely.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type of the server.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The state of the server.

columns.name: version
columns.description: Specifies the version of the server.

columns.name: user_visible_state
columns.description: A state of a server that is visible to user. Possible values include: 'Ready', 'Dropping', 'Disabled', 'Inaccessible'.

columns.name: location
columns.description: The resource location.

columns.name: administrator_login
columns.description: Specifies the username of the administrator for this server.

columns.name: backup_retention_days
columns.description: Backup retention days for the server.

columns.name: byok_enforcement
columns.description: Status showing whether the server data encryption is enabled with customer-managed keys.

columns.name: earliest_restore_date
columns.description: Specifies the earliest restore point creation time.

columns.name: fully_qualified_domain_name
columns.description: The fully qualified domain name of the server.

columns.name: geo_redundant_backup
columns.description: Indicates whether Geo-redundant is enabled, or not for server backup.

columns.name: infrastructure_encryption
columns.description: Status showing whether the server enabled infrastructure encryption. Possible values include: 'Enabled', 'Disabled'.

columns.name: master_server_id
columns.description: The master server id of a replica server.

columns.name: minimal_tls_version
columns.description: Enforce a minimal Tls version for the server. Possible values include: 'TLS10', 'TLS11', 'TLS12', 'TLSEnforcementDisabled'.

columns.name: public_network_access
columns.description: Indicates whether or not public network access is allowed for this server. Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'. Possible values include: 'Enabled', 'Disabled'.

columns.name: replica_capacity
columns.description: The maximum number of replicas that a master server can have.

columns.name: replication_role
columns.description: The replication role of the server.

columns.name: sku_capacity
columns.description: The scale up/out capacity, representing server's compute units.

columns.name: sku_family
columns.description: The family of hardware.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: The name of the sku. For example: 'B_Gen4_1', 'GP_Gen5_8'.

columns.name: sku_size
columns.description: The size code, to be interpreted by resource as appropriate.

columns.name: sku_tier
columns.description: The tier of the particular SKU. Possible values include: 'Basic', 'GeneralPurpose', 'MemoryOptimized'.

columns.name: ssl_enforcement
columns.description: Enable ssl enforcement or not when connect to server. Possible values include: 'Enabled', 'Disabled'.

columns.name: storage_auto_grow
columns.description: Indicates whether storage auto grow is enabled, or not.

columns.name: storage_mb
columns.description: Indicates max storage allowed for a server.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: A list of private endpoint connections on a server.

columns.name: server_configurations
columns.description: The server configurations(parameters) details of the server.

columns.name: server_keys
columns.description: The server keys of the server.

columns.name: server_security_alert_policy
columns.description: Security alert policy associated with the MySQL Server.

columns.name: vnet_rules
columns.description: Rules represented by VNET.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
